Package Model

Class ProjectHandler

java.lang.Object
Model.FileHandler
Model.ProjectHandler
public class ProjectHandler
extends FileHandler
This class is used to handle projects. It uses a singleton design pattern. It allows different actions on projects such as copy, deletion, save, share or renaming.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject​(User user, java.lang.String path, java.lang.String title) throws ProjectCreationException, DirectoryCreationException, ProjectAlreadyExistsException
      Create a new project for the user
      Parameters:
      user - creator
      path - project path
      title - project title
      Returns:
      project created
      Throws:
      ProjectCreationException - if creation failed
      DirectoryCreationException - if could not create project directory
      ProjectAlreadyExistsException - if there already is a project with that name

    • saveProjectInfo

      public void saveProjectInfo​(Project project) throws ProjectSaveException
      Save a project
      Parameters:
      project - project to save
      Throws:
      ProjectSaveException - if save failed

    • setupProjectDirectory

      private void setupProjectDirectory​(Project project) throws DirectoryCreationException, ProjectAlreadyExistsException
      Setup the project directory
      Parameters:
      project - project which has to get a directory
      Throws:
      DirectoryCreationException - If the directory creation failed
      ProjectAlreadyExistsException - if the project already exists

    • loadProject

      public Project loadProject​(java.lang.String path) throws ProjectLoadException
      Load a project based on its path
      Parameters:
      path - project path
      Returns:
      corresponding project
      Throws:
      ProjectLoadException - if the load failed

    • createCopy

      public Project createCopy​(Project projectToCopy, User user) throws ProjectCopyException
      Create a copy of a project for a user
      Parameters:
      projectToCopy - project to copy
      user - creator of the new project
      Returns:
      copy of the project
      Throws:
      ProjectCopyException - if copy failed

    • findNewPathIndex

      private int findNewPathIndex​(Project projectToCopy)
      Find next available name to copy a project.
      Parameters:
      projectToCopy - project to copy
      Returns:
      first available index that will be appended to project to copy title

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject​(Project project) throws ProjectDeletionException
      Delete a project and its save
      Parameters:
      project - project to delete
      Throws:
      ProjectDeletionException - if deletion failed

    • deleteFromUser

      private void deleteFromUser​(Project project, java.lang.String creatorUsername, UserHandler userHandler) throws UserFromSaveCreationException, SaveUserException
      Removes a project from a user file.
      Parameters:
      project - project to be removed
      creatorUsername - project creator username
      userHandler - UserHandler
      Throws:
      UserFromSaveCreationException - if user file could not be read
      SaveUserException - if user file could not be saved

    • renameProject

      public void renameProject​(Project project, java.lang.String newTitle) throws ProjectRenameException
      Renames a project title. Changes the name of the LaTeX file but not of the project directory.
      Parameters:
      project - project to be renamed
      newTitle - new project title
      Throws:
      ProjectRenameException - if project could not be saved

    • shareProject

      public void shareProject​(java.lang.String collaboratorUsername, Project project) throws UserFromSaveCreationException, ProjectSaveException, SaveUserException
      Shares a project with given collaborator
      Parameters:
      collaboratorUsername - username of the collaborator the project is shared with
      project - project to be shared
      Throws:
      UserFromSaveCreationException - if collaborator file couldn't be read
      ProjectSaveException - if project file couldn't be saved
      SaveUserException - if collaborator file couldn't be saved

    • generateSaveFromProject

      private java.lang.String generateSaveFromProject​(Project project)
      Generate a save text based on a project
      Parameters:
      project - project to be saved
      Returns:
      save content

    • generateProjectFromSave

      private Project generateProjectFromSave​(java.lang.String saveText, java.lang.String path) throws ProjectFromSaveGenerationException
      Generate the project from a text save
      Parameters:
      saveText - content of the save
      path - path to the project directory
      Returns:
      project created
      Throws:
      ProjectFromSaveGenerationException - if the parsing for the date failed

    • getProjectCode

      public java.lang.String getProjectCode() throws java.io.IOException
      Reads project code in LaTeX file.
      Returns:
      source code
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if project LaTeX file could not be read

    • makeTexFile

      public void makeTexFile​(java.lang.String sourceCode) throws LatexWritingException
      Creates a .tex file for every new user, and updates it with the new source code when compiling.
      Parameters:
      sourceCode - String from the compiling text area
      Throws:
      LatexWritingException - when the text has not be written successfully in the tex file

    • generateTexFile

      public void generateTexFile​(Project project) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes template code in project LaTeX file.
      Parameters:
      project - project to be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if project file couldn't be read/written
